name: Little Light Hoarder
description:
Wuupu's house is a bit dark. This is why it decided to venture into the nearby caves to acquire some light! But is Wuupu smart enough to not get lost in the darkness on its way back?

Stuck?

No need to panic! Hit the R key to restart the level.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrows to move.
  • S or Down to drop through a platform.
  • Escape or P to pause.
  • R to restart the level.

Gamepad is also supported!

Credits

Developed by Theodor Ratkin for Mini Jam 103.

  • Tileset Cavernas by Adam Saltsman.
  • Song Ambient, Meditation - In Eternity by Andrewkn.
  • Cave sound Water Cave by Klangkobold.
  • Light collection sound Mein bottle pling by skylarjulian.
